entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Light snow beginning overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 12.
